Chapter 6 Interactive component 6.1 Explaination The interactive component allows the user to study the positions of a team on a specific map. Positions are split in CT and T positions as both sides face each other. To generate each map .csv data, we grouped the damages data by match id in the Generate_csv.Rmd file. The .csv files are stored in the docs/D3/csv folders of the GitHub repository and are arranged by events, teams and maps.
